item.title: Locarno Adds Vicky Krieps-Starring ‘Yakushima’s Illusion’ From Naomi Kawase to Competition
item.description: The late addition brings the main competition section of the Swiss festival to 18 titles.

item.title: Ella Beatty to Star as Lizzie Borden in ‘Monster’ Season 4 at Netflix
item.description: Rebecca Hall and Vicky Krieps have also been cast in the anthology from Ryan Murphy.
